tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ContentPerformanceMetrics (
    content_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    views INT,
    shares INT,
    engagement FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE content_performance_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_name VARCHAR(255),
    views INT,
    shares INT,
    engagement INT
)

CREATE TABLE user_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    content_id INT,
    views INT,
    shares INT,
    engagement INT
)

CREATE TABLE content_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_name VARCHAR(50),
    views INT,
    shares INT,
    engagement INT
)

CREATE TABLE user_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(50),
    total_views INT,
    total_shares INT,
    total_engagement INT
)

CREATE TABLE platform_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    platform_name VARCHAR(50),
    platform_type VARCHAR(50),
    total_views INT,
    total_shares INT,
    total_engagement INT
)
CREATE TABLE content (id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, views INT DEFAULT 0, shares INT DEFAULT 0, engagement FLOAT DEFAULT 0.0);
CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE views (view_id INT PRIMARY KEY, content_id INT, viewer_id INT, view_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE shares (share_id INT PRIMARY KEY, content_id INT, sharer_id INT, share_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE ContentPerformanceMetrics (
  ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ContentTitle TEXT NOT NULL,
  Views INT DEFAULT 0,
  Shares INT DEFAULT 0,
  EngagementScore FLOAT DEFAULT 0
);

CREATE TABLE UserMetrics (
  UserID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  UserName TEXT NOT NULL,
  TotalViews INT DEFAULT 0,
  TotalShares INT DEFAULT 0,
  TotalEngagement FLOAT DEFAULT 0
);

CREATE TABLE SiteMetrics (
  SiteID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  SiteName TEXT NOT NULL,
  TotalViews INT DEFAULT 0,
  TotalShares INT DEFAULT 0,
  TotalEngagement FLOAT DEFAULT 0
);
